CatDescriptText: Miss Merle Henderson, 505 McDonald Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 15, 1958, pg. 2 �Do you think that the numbers game should be legalized or outlawed?� answer reads: �I think that they should be leagiaized [sic] because it is hard to stop people from playing them anyhow.�
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Merle Henderson, wearing dark coat pleated at waist with collar and cuffs, standing in front of light colored wall between windows with light colored curtains
